title: Rogers Park! 3 Bedroom 2 Bathroom Condo Quality W/D
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 303315476', 'Rent: $2,700 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 2', 'Available Date: 07/15/2022', 'Pet: No Pets', 'Rent Includes:: Water', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'This spacious 3 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment offers comfort living and high-end finishes including the following features / amenities: Hardwood floors, Stainless steel appliances, Dishwasher, Microwave, Granite counter tops, In-unit washers & dryers.', 'On-site bike storage.', 'Off-street parking ($175/Month).', 'There is no Security Deposit - $300 per resident move-in fee.', 'The Devon Collection, a new construction luxury apartment community located at the boarder of the vibrant Edgewater and Rogers Park neighborhoods.', "Just steps away from Loyola University Chicago's Lakeshore Campus and 2 blocks to the CTA Red Line's Loyola station.", 'The apartment is surrounded by an eclectic mix of local and national retailers makes this a perfect home for students.', 'FEATURES', 'Central Air', 'Dining Room', 'Dishwasher', 'Disposal', 'Eat-In Kitchen', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Laundry in Unit', 'Microwave', 'Oven/Range', 'Refrigerator', 'Storage']
